**Source** [Pathfinder #159: All or Nothing](/Sources.aspx?ID=48) pg. 79 **Archetype** [Provocator](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=87) **Prerequisites** [Provocator Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2211) **Requirements** Your last action was a Strike that dropped an opponent to 0 Hit Points. --- Attempt a [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) check, comparing the result to the Will DC of each foe within 30 feet who can see you. Regardless of the result, each target is immune to your Flourishing Finish for 10 minutes. **Critical Success** The target is [frightened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19).
**Success** The target is frightened 1.
